DEVICE_ROT_DOC: Sets orientation for display and all input/output layers.
CALIBRATION_SECTION_DOC: Adjust only if hardware layers do not align with device orientation. Most users will not need this.
TOUCH_OFFSET_DOC: Compensate for touch panel physical mounting orientation.
POINTER_OFFSET_DOC: For absolute pointing devices (graphics tablets). Leave at None for mice.
FBCON_OFFSET_DOC: Console text rotation (TTY). Applies on reboot.
PLYMOUTH_OFFSET_DOC: Boot splash rotation (panel_orientation). Applies on reboot.
MOUSE_C_DOC: If enabled, the mouse cursor is hidden when not in use.
SCREENSAVER_DOC: Set the timeout before screensaver in seconds. 0 = no screensaver.
NO_SS_IF_PLAY_DOC: Disable screensaver when playing. Timeout is applied when playback stops.
GENERATE_DIAG_DOC: Creates diagnostic report for troubleshooting display issues.
